title: Replace Facilitator headshot image with the newly uploaded photo

requirements.text: Replace the headshot image used in the “Facilitator” part of the landing page (currently implemented in the PractitionerAuthority section) with the user-uploaded image file “WhatsApp Image 2026-02-05 at 9.44.49 AM.jpeg”, and serve it as a frontend static asset.

quotes: Can you replace the image you have for the Facilitator part with this attached one?

acceptanceCriteria: The PractitionerAuthority (Facilitator/Practitioner) headshot no longer references the old image path and instead references the new uploaded photo as a static asset (e.g., under frontend/public/assets/...).
The new image is included in the repository under frontend/public so it is served directly by the frontend build (no backend fetching).
The headshot renders correctly in the PractitionerAuthority section in both mobile and desktop layouts without stretching (maintains a square crop/aspect).

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other frontend immutablePaths listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Backend (Motoko) code must not be changed for this request.
nonGoals: No copy/layout redesign of the landing page beyond swapping the image.
No changes to access gating, booking, Stripe, or authentication flows.

edits: Crop/resize the uploaded photo to a centered square headshot and export as a web-optimized JPG (WhatsApp Image 2026-02-05 at 9.44.49 AM.jpeg > facilitator-headshot.user-upload.dim_400x400.jpg)
